title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
short_desc: Foundational AWS certification covering cloud concepts, billing, security and services.
long_desc: An entry-level AWS certification that teaches core cloud ideas, AWS service categories, basic security practices, and cost models. Ideal for newcomers to cloud computing or business professionals seeking cloud literacy.

title: AWS Solutions Architect — Associate
short_desc: Design resilient, performant systems on AWS — associate-level exam prep.
long_desc: Covers AWS architectural best practices, compute and storage services, networking, and recommended design patterns for highly available and fault-tolerant systems. Includes hands-on labs and architecture walkthroughs.

title: PMP — Project Management Professional (PMI)
short_desc: PMP preparation aligned to PMI standards — exam-focused training.
long_desc: Comprehensive PMP course that follows PMI’s exam outline: project initiation, planning, execution, monitoring & control, and closing. Includes mock tests, scenario-based questions, and practical templates.

title: Cisco CCNA
short_desc: Core networking concepts and Cisco device configuration for CCNA exam readiness.
long_desc: Hands-on networking course covering routing, switching, subnetting, basic security and device configuration using Cisco IOS. Lab exercises simulate real network setups to prepare you for the CCNA exam.

title: ISC2 — SSCP / Security Fundamentals
short_desc: Core security operations knowledge covering access controls, cryptography, and risk.
long_desc: A practical security fundamentals course introducing access controls, network security, cryptography basics, and operations. Suitable for professionals moving into security operations or preparing for ISC2 certifications.

title: Data Analytics with Python
short_desc: Learn data cleaning, analysis and visualization using Python (Pandas, Matplotlib).
long_desc: Covers data ingestion, cleaning, exploratory analysis, visualization and basic modeling using Python libraries. Project-focused: complete a real-world dataset project and dashboard.

title: Full Stack JavaScript Bootcamp
short_desc: Build full-stack apps with React, Node.js and PostgreSQL — project-based.
long_desc: Project-led bootcamp: frontend with modern React, backend with Node/Express, relational database usage, authentication, and deployment. Students complete portfolio-ready projects.

title: CEH — Certified Ethical Hacker
short_desc: Ethical hacking techniques, penetration testing methodology and labs.
long_desc: Hands-on training in penetration testing: reconnaissance, scanning, exploitation, post-exploitation and reporting. Labs simulate real-world environments to practice ethical hacking skills safely.

title: Google Data Analytics — Foundations
short_desc: Core data analytics concepts: cleaning, visualization and interpretation.
long_desc: An introduction to data analytics fundamentals aligned with industry practices. Covers data wrangling, visualization techniques, and communicating findings with dashboards and reports.

title: GMAT Preparation
short_desc: GMAT strategy, quant & verbal practice with timed mocks.
long_desc: Complete GMAT prep with concept review, strategy sessions for quant and verbal, and full-length timed mock exams to build pacing and exam confidence.

title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
short_desc: Foundations of Azure services, pricing, and cloud concepts.
long_desc: Covers Azure core services, identity, governance, pricing and support options—suitable for beginners preparing for the Azure fundamentals exam.

title: DevOps Fundamentals
short_desc: CI/CD, containers, automation and practical pipeline examples.
long_desc: Introduces continuous integration/delivery, containerization with Docker, orchestration basics, and practical automation pipelines for modern software delivery.
